desc.p: Contains the automatic adjustment raised to the POSITION record of the associated AL.CCY.MKT. The adjustment amount will be raised to bring the CRB balance into line with the Position balance for that currency, market and position type. Automatic adjustments are only raised when the associated CORRECT.EXCEP is set to Y. The adjustment amount is calculated as follows: (AL.CCY.EXCEP - AL.CCY.COR.AMT) * -1
Contains the balance of the currency POSITION records for the associated AL.CCY.MKT in the currency itself.
Contains the local currency total of Profit and Loss for the system. The total is calculated from the CONSOLIDATE.PRFT.LOSS application.
Local currency field No input allowed
Contains the exception amount when there is a difference between the associated AL.LCL.BAL, the CRB balance and AL.LCL.POS, the position balance.
Contains the currency code for the associated system total fields.
Contains the market, position type and currency for which the associated position system check totals are specified.

Specifies if an exception occurs between the profit and loss and asset and liablilty balances, that the difference should be automatically corrected. If set to Y the system will raise the difference to the suspense account in local currency of the category defined in the CONSOLIDATE.COND record ASSET&LIAB in the field ADJ.ACCT.CAT. The posting will be made with the transaction code defined in the field ADJ.ACCT.TXN. The difference amount can be found in the field EXCEPT.AMT.LCY.
Optional Input Valid entry of Y only Entry of Y is only allowed if the record key is the last working day Entry of Y is only allowed if the EXECPT.AMT.LCY is not null
Specifies the total local currency asset and liability balance of the system. The total is calculated from the CONSOLIDATE.ASST.LIAB records for all non-contingent types.
Local currency amount field No input field
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Contains the local equivalent balance of the AL.CCY.BAL.AMT field.
No input field Local currency amount field

Specifies if the exception amounts held in the associated AL.CCY.EXCEP and AL.LCY.EXCEP are to be automatically adjusted so that the position total matches the CRB total. If set to Y the system will adjust the values and the adjustment amount raised will be held in the AL.POS.ADJUST and AL.POS.LCY.ADJ fields. Automatic adjustment is only possible on the next working day after an exception occurs.
Optional field Valid input is Y Input only allowed if system date defined in the key is equal to the last working day Input is only allowed if AL.CCY.EXCEP is not null.

Contains the local equivalent of the automatic adjustment raised to the POSITION record of the associated AL.CCY.MKT. The adjustment amount will be raised to bring the CRB balance into line with the Position balance for that currency, market and position type. Automatic adjustments are only raised when the associated CORRECT.EXCEP is set to Y. The adjustment amount is calculated as follows: (AL.LCY.EXCEP - AL.LCY.COR.AMT) * -1
Contains the local equivalent of the correction amounts in foreign currency in the associated AL.CCY.COR.AMT field.
